words.definition: Showing sensitivity when dealing with others.
words.arabic_definition: إظهار الحساسية عند التعامل مع الآخرين.

example.en: Be tactful when providing critical feedback.
example.ar: كن لبقًا عند تقديم ملاحظات نقدية.

example.en: Give constructive criticism rather than negative remarks.
example.ar: قدم نقدًا بنّاءً بدلًا من ملاحظات سلبية.

example.en: He was very receptive to feedback from his team.
She used humor to disarm the tense conversation.
example.ar: استخدمت الدعابة لنزع فتيل المحادثة المتوترة.

words.definition: The ability to understand and share the feelings of others.
words.arabic_definition: القدرة على تفهم مشاعر الآخرين ومشاركتها.

example.en: Listening with empathy can de-escalate conflict.
example.ar: الاستماع بتعاطف يمكن أن يقلل من حدة الصراع.

words.definition: Confidently stating one's needs and opinions.
words.arabic_definition: التعبير عن احتياجات وآراء الشخص بثقة.

example.en: He gave an assertive reply to the challenging question.
example.ar: قدم إجابة حازمة على السؤال الصعب.

words.definition: The skill of managing sensitive conversations.

example.en: Her diplomacy helped calm down the discussion.

words.definition: To reduce the intensity of a conflict.

example.en: He spoke softly to de-escalate the situation.

words.definition: Not supporting any side in a disagreement.
words.arabic_definition: عدم دعم أي جانب في نزاع.

example.en: Try to stay neutral during the debate.

words.definition: The act of finding an answer or agreement.

example.en: Their conversation led to a peaceful resolution.
